title: Bulk Image Downloader 4.21
description:
Bulk Image Downloader is specially created to automatically download and save images from various image hosting sites,forums, bypassing all the annoying popups and ads that these sites are usually full of.

Features: -

--------------

Downloads full sized images from web galleries automatically (save time!)

Preview galleries interactively and download just the images you want

Integrates with IE, Firefox and Opera

Supports almost all popular image host sites

Bypasses all annoying popups and adverts

Queue Manager allows for multiple galleries to be downloaded automatically without user input



OS : Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8

Note:
1) Disconnect the internet 
2) Run the setup (bid_4_21_setup.exe)
3) UNCHECK the "Run BID on completion" n other 2 checkboxes at the end of installation process (uncheck all 3 b4 clicking "Finish"
3) Copy the crack (olepro32.dll) in the installation directory (Nothing wil b replaced)
4) Open "BID.exe" from installed location.
5) In "Configuration" tab, UNCHECK "Automatically check for updates" (Disable automatic update check)on right hand side
IMP: From step 1 to 5, INTERNET SHOULD BE DISABLED!
6) Now connect to internet n start using BID.
Note: U will still continue to get the message "This copy of BID is not registered. Click here to purchase reg code". Just IGNORE it :)
You can check that u vil b able to run more than 2 instances of BID n also u CAN download > 100 images per batch. All restrictions removed :)
